attributes.action:
Keep Ye Olde Foundry open as a rock pub!
Reverse Stonegate decision.
attributes.additional_details: The whole community is upset, it’s a friendly, loving, amazing pub with brilliant people and brilliant owner. This has shocked the whole community and upset the lot of us, this decision is very unfair and will cause community upset.
attributes.background: Reverse the decision of stonegate, fining and revoking Jake (owner) license. After they moaned at him buying outside stock as they used to miss deliveries and took the absolute mick. Making the pub shut with immediate effect. It’s disgusted us all.
